name: Red Dead Pixel Man
description: Red Dead Pixel Man is a 2D-action game. Kill the boss at the bottom stage to get a super coin and win the game. Collect 4 coins to win perfectly.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7> Processor: INTEL Pentium Dual-Core G4400 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce MX150 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: intel core i7 8700k Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia geforce gtx 1050 ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
